Articles.Content:
Hello my name is MunarAssassin, Im with the kerbal assassins 8) You\'ll be seeing me making rockets, Which i will give out to the public.

But lets go on now?, First. Let me say the rules. Jeb is a honered man. He makes us shed man tears :\'( And bill gets the badge of denying jeb. And bob... You get the badge of... being a scaredy cat. Like a BOSS

Ok now. This is my goodbye. See you soon.

*Cough* Star trek fan *Cough*

Welcome to the forums ,

I think someone here has made a pretty good star trex style ship, considering it uses mainly stock parts.

Happy Engineering!
Enjoy stock star trek awesomeness here.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky
